评论详情: I really liked this dress! I fabric didn’t wrinkle and I felt super comfortable all night. I really liked how it was kind of stretchy but didn’t look cheap.

评论概述: Get the sparkles for extra glam!
评论详情: I purchased this dress for a Gala & I am so pleased with the quality and price. The cut is ultra flattering. I purchased a size medium for my pear shaped 155 lb body. The fabric is stretch and very forgiving. I ordered two of these because I thought the sparkles could be cheap looking, but they are actually gorgeous and make the dress look much fancier. The cut is classy and perfect for a winter event. I also ordered the all black and it seemed a little plain after having the pretty sparkles on the navy.  (I purchased 5 other dresses from Amazon and this one is the winner. )

评论用户: Great products recommend for people with rough skin! It soothes and helps with bump skin
评论详情: I was looking for a last minute dress for my baby shower and babyyyy when I tell you this dress is fire I mean it! It’s elegant and classy with great quality! I loved every bit of this dress

Perfect color, mesh sleeves and stretchy fabric so I was comfortable all night. Flattering fit around the tummy area. Long sleeves were mesh so I was able to stay warm while still getting some airflow.  Dislikes: the off the shoulder area kept coming up and I had to adjust the shoulders just about every 2 min. I probably won’t wear the dress again but it was pretty in pictures and comfortable.
Very pretty but was longer and bigger then I thought

This dress is flowy and fun. I would have given it 5 stars but the downside to it was that the off shoulder kept trying to push up onto my shoulders. I felt like I spent a good deal of the night readjusting it. The fit however was exceptional. It clung to my curves in a flattering way while still giving a slimming effect. The length was great not too long or too short could be worn with heels or flats. The material was stretchy but not see through and black is always a classic look.

I purchased this dress for NYE after seeing several influencers raving about it. After trying it on I did not feel that it was a great option or worth the hype. The sparkle of the fabric was nice and it did fit true to size. However, I was annoyed that the fold-over part kept rolling up and I had to constantly adjust it. I did not end up wearing it for NYE due to how much adjusting it required just trying it on and returned it as I did not feel it was a quality item worth keeping!

评论概述: Looks better on your body than on the hanger…
评论详情: Great dress! When I took the garment out of the package I was initially concerned because the material appeared more like a dance costume than a dress. Once I put it on I was very pleased with the fit, the movement, and the overall look. I felt elegant at the winter wedding I attended and received lots of compliments. The stretchiness is great and it’s lined well, however I opted to wear shaping undergarments for a smoother and sleeker hourglass look. The color is rich… but the sparkles do rub onto whatever you come in contact with (a little). Also the neckline is elegant, but I had to adjust the garment back down off my shoulders several times because when you raise your arms to eat, drink, hug someone etc… the shoulders slide up. Overall, great value for the money. I ordered a small (4’11”, 143lbs)

评论概述: Lovely off the shoulder maxi dress!
评论详情: When I came across this dress I instantly loved the dark and moody navy printed fabric which was a nice change to all the light and bright colors I see so often. The print of the dress actually reminded me of a moody dark sky at night with clouds in it. I received the dress and tried it on and I’m very happy with it. It has a long maxi dress style and could be worn to a formal wedding or event. I think this dress could probably be worn year round or at least in 3 seasons. It is made of a mesh- like fabric that is semi- sheer, but the dress is fully lined except at the sleeves. Speaking of sleeves- when I wore the dress off the shoulder as it is intended to be worn, the sleeves were quite a bit too long. It didn’t really bother me and I have no problem wearing it like that but you might end up having to get the sleeves altered shorter. 🤣 Other than that, the dress basically ran true to size.  One annoyance is that the off the shoulder detail at the top has to be folded over and worn off the shoulder. It is annoying because it doesn’t really want to stay in place or stay like that. I do think if I can’t sew it in place I may end up adjusting it and fixing the off the shoulder detail the entire night. The dress is so gorgeous and unique though that I don’t mind figuring out a way to make it work! I can see myself wearing this dress with strappy heels and a clutch purse to the next formal wedding I attend. This is a really unique and special dress that can be worn for years to come. It is the perfect combination of fashion- forward, unique, and stylish. You’ll stand out at any wedding you attend wearing this- without looking overexposed or like you’re trying to steal the show. Gorgeous dress, beautiful fabric, nice cut- 5 stars!

This item fits very well. I would recommend reading the size guide, because I normally take XL orXXL, and in this dress, I take L. Vut it just feels so sexy, so rich! It provides wonderful coverage, and the material is the perfect thickness. I highly recommend this if you want to look like you're made of money without breaking the bank.

评论概述: Perfect Floral Maxi Dress for Church and Office Wear
评论详情: I bought this stunning dress as a gift for my lovely wife, who is absolutely in love with floral long dresses. This one, in particular, stood out to her because of the off-shoulder design, which gives it a beautiful, elegant touch. She has been wearing it to church and also to the office. I always love to pamper her with thoughtful gifts, and she truly adores this dress! The bodycon fit accentuates her figure perfectly, while the long sleeves make it a great choice for various occasions. The black floral pattern adds sophistication, and the fabric feels comfortable and breathable. If you're looking for a versatile, chic dress that can be worn for both formal and casual events, this one is definitely worth considering. Highly recommend!

评论概述: I received so many compliments throughout the night!
评论详情: I recently wore the KUTUMAI Off Shoulder Bodycon Maxi Dress to a wedding, and it was a showstopper! The long sleeves and mesh ruched design give it an elegant yet trendy look that’s perfect for formal occasions. The fit is incredibly flattering, hugging my curves in all the right places while still being comfortable. I received so many compliments throughout the night! The fabric feels high-quality and has a nice stretch, making it easy to move in. Overall, this dress is a fantastic choice for anyone looking to make a statement at a party or wedding. Highly recommend it!

My favorite part about this dress is the top part where it looks strapless And the shoulders are open and uncovered, but there is sleeves on the dress. The fabric it’s really well and snug against the body. The material is stretchy and the color is just as described on the picture.
This dress really is quite perfect. The fabric is nice and dress stays  put on the shoulders. I might buy it in more colors.
Stretchy but thin material, comfortable and elegant not meant for short ladies!
Fits nicely

The dress is very beautiful. The fabric stretches so well and shows off your figure. The long mesh sleeves with interesting cuffs adds elegance to this bodycon dress. The fit was nice and fabric was fine, the only con I had was mentioned by some other reviewers already. The sexy off shoulder ruched folding-over portion was really a fold-over piece of fabric, so it just kept rolling and rides-up, never stayed in place for more than a few seconds.  I don't have huge breasts. I think I need to sew it in a few discreet locations to keep the piece in place. Or, get matching colored magnetic pins in combination with a pretty brooch to hold it in place. But I shouldn't have to go through all this, with this price tag, so I'm knocking off a star.
I originally ordered green but it looked a bit bland and I was very happy with the navy blue. I did have to keep pulling the fold down because it does rise over my shoulders but overall I loved it!

I think this is pretty good dress! Very good quality, light, no see through, not going to wrinkle. You can have your shoulders open as much as on the model, or you can have it more up as on my pictures. The only con- If you pull it more down to show more shoulder, don’t raise your hands up, cause it’ll slide up. Still looks good though. I ordered size S. I’m 5’2’’ tall, 138lb. The length is perfect for me. I can wear it with flats if I want. I also had no bra on, and you cannot really tell. I would highly recommend this dress!

This dress is both cute and stretchy, making it flattering and comfortable to wear. The material feels great and has a good amount of give which is perfect for various occasions. Highly recommend for a stylish, effortless look!
Was one of the most beautiful dresses at the high school dance!
True to size Great price Color is as expected Comfortable, on the thinner side for the material

The dress is very flattering, sized down to a small for a tighter fit. I wish it was just a few inches longer. It’s pretty stretchy and felt like I still had room, even after sizing down. The only place where it was a bit tight was around the shoulders.
I got this dress for my daughter who normally wears a woman's med. The dress fit her perfect and the color is beautiful.  The material is lightweight and strechy.
It’s a no for me. I bought it to wear to a wedding but it reminded me too much it my choir performance dress from high school. So I returned it.  Gave me no shape or form.

I am returning it as the quality did not surprise me, I feel like for the price I’d be able to get something better. Lovely color and good length, however the strapless part is a bit uncomfortable as it keeps rolling up
The shoulders roll up and don’t stay down.

Mine came with straps and the sleeves detached so I had a string to tie around my neck and then the sleeves at the top weren’t connected so it definitely didn’t look like picture. I sent it back. Don’t recommend.
This fit my gf perfectly. She said the fabric was really soft and contoured to her body really nicely. At the party we went to she kept getting compliments on it alllll night. It's a keeper for her.

I absolutely love this dress! Its so soft and comfortable and it is form fitting but still has room. I wore nip covers and a slip to get a smooth look. It’s definitely worth every cent.  Im 5’6 about 165lbs and got a medium! I got so many compliments in this as well. Oh the only thing that bothered me was the overlay part kept sliding up so you may want to get clothes tape to tape it in place on your skin and the fabric to itself

This is a lovely evening dress that fits your body like a glove.  I am 5'4'' and 119 pounds and normally wear small or medium sizes, however I was concerned that those sizes would be too long for me and cover my feet totally so I ordered XS. It arrived quickly and in good condition and when I tried it on I thought I made the right decision. XS fits great, not too tight, not too long. Material is nice and thick, yet has a flowy texture. Its color is as it looks on the screen, so I am really pleased. The sleeves are semitransparent and very flattering. The rushed part has the same material with sleeves. The only downside is that the rushed part, which is rolled over the shoulders, keeps riding up. So, it may cause some annoyance at an event where you wouldn't want to keep arranging your shoulders. I am thinking about using fabric tape to keep it in place but haven't had the chance to do it. But still a five star for me!
Not true to size even when sizing up. This material was cheap and I couldn’t even fit is over my head. It should be labeled as a juniors.
I ordered a small I’m 5’4 130 lbs and it was a bit loose so I fixed it with safety pins. But other than that great quality, and looks really elegant.

I lost 100# & wanted something to show off my new body....this was perfection! So comfy, it felt like a wash & wear. Perfect amount of sparkle & it fit like a glove. In my opinion, it was not see-through, I wore a bra & panties under, my straps looked like it was part of the dress(you could opt for strapless or a strapless with rhinestone straps), you could not see them through the very comfy lining. This dress was easy, breezy & beautiful. I received an amazing amount of compliments & my husband couldn't keep his hands off of me. Not too thick, not too thin, material was just right. I need more formal functions to wear this to!
Wearing this for my work Christmas party - I love it! Very comfy & stretchy. Got a size L. I’m 5’4, wish it was a bit longer so it covered my heels but oh well.

A beautiful color and design and perfect for the holidays. This is a comfortable dress where you won't be uncomfortable wearing this outfit for hours. The off the shoulders is very attractive and I do love the longer sleeves. This dress gives a sleek look. It's not stretchy and material very good weight. Zipper good.

I would like to start by saying this is the first time I have ever left a negative review in my life. This is also not a joke even though I realize how ridiculous it sounds lol. The dress was pretty and looked as expected; however, it was one of the stinkiest things i’ve ever smelled. As soon as I opened the bag it smelled like the worst BO i’ve ever smelled in my life. I actually gagged when I smelled the dress itself. 0/10 would not buy again and I will be returning/trashing this STINKY dress.

This is a nice dress that is suitable for the opera or for a family holiday dinner (the two things in planning to wear it to). The green color is dark and elegant. The mesh sleeves are long and are giving a little bit of whimsy to this serious dress. The material is stretchy and shows your flaws but if I add some shapewear and a nice necklace, this will look amazing on. I took off one star because the off the shoulder top looks good, but is a little fussy. I have to keep adjusting it because the extra material moves around a lot.

This gown was lovely! The sheer fabric you see in the sleeves is the cover layer of the whole dress (so it’s lined). The two layers create a bit of static, but once you get that under control it looked lovely all night.
It’s a nice dress but I’m wearing xl I just have too much boobies for this dress I didn’t like it on me but if works for you that’s all matter!
Very elegant and beautiful, good quality dress, perfect fit and perfect length for formal occasions.
This dress is absolutely perfect for the holiday season. All of the styles they offer are so stunning, especially the glittery ones. I got a solid navy blue one and it fits me like a glove.
Such a pretty, flattering dress!

I liked the idea and design of this dress! It gave a highly elegant yet relaxed vibe. It's too bad though that the sizes run incredibly large! I ordered a medium and it came big enough for me to fit myself and another person inside of it. So, I had to give it away because it was just way too big, but otherwise, the dress idea is very pretty! Also, the fabric was soft enough to not irritate the skin, so that was an added bonus!

I love the Cranberry goodness! Just in time for T day and mid- winter festivities. Love how it clutches at my shoulders. Flattering but bring that shapeware for the kill. Stretchy, comfy and decent quality.

First of all I wanted to order an XS, and it was suggested I order a Small. So I did, ordered black and wine color for a black tie event on November 23rd, 2024. Wasn’t sure if I wanted to wear black or wine. (the wine is a beautiful color) Sent them both back and ordered wine in the XS, it’s too long and didn’t have enough time to get it altered. I wish I had ordered the XS from the very start! Learned a valuable lesson here.
Such a stunning dress. Fit great material feels nice and like that it has some stretch to it while still hugging in all the right places. Nicely made for the price.
Love this dress and it fits my pregnancy bump!!

This dress is so elegant - it's really flattering and the sizing is spot on. I really like the neckline and the sheer sleeves in contrast to the beautiful blue. I'm looking forward to wearing this in December.

评论概述: Very very nice dress for the price
评论详情: The color is spot on, the outer mesh is nice, and the lining is very smooth and soft.  The mesh arms are a bit long, so if you're shorter you may have some bunching, or you can try to stuff the extra fabric into the off-shoulder mesh. That said it's soft and has a barely there feel, not scratchy or bothersome.  The sizing seems about right on, and there's enough give in the material to accommodate different body types.  I would like it if there was a little bit more mesh for the chest/off shoulder area. As it is, it's just loose, so you may find yourself readjusting a bit throughout an evening.  The only thing I didn't care for honestly is there is no apparent front or back to this dress. It's like a double-sided tube. The front and back seem interchangeable which I guess is ok, but it also means there is no real shaping to this dress. It doesn't seem to cause an issue but if you're hoping for a more tailored fit, this won't be it.
This is a beautiful dress. The sizing was accurate. It's very flattering, I'm excited to wear it out. It's comfortable and made with quality materials. It's for sure a great value for the money.

This dress is beautiful, perfect for the holidays, the color is really nicely, very stretchy, i like how it fits me, true size, the material is very soft, not see through at all ( only the sleeves). The quality is good.

This dress is beautiful. Perfect to wear to a wedding, New Years Eve Party or a formal event. Because the navy blue is a flat color it pairs perfect with sparkly silver accessories. It fit true to size.

...As something stated, the fold-over section does not stay in place and rides up. I thought about sewing it down, but I don't know how that would look. I like the bell sleeve at the wrist, and I got a large, so the dress fits perfectly without showing any bulge. It has no shapewear on yet. It can be worn to a nice dinner or party.
This dress was a Knockout, wore to a wedding this fall So many compliments!!! Small, fit was perfect, excellent quality very comfortable dress. I ordered Brown w Glitter👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽🎉
The quality of this dress is unreal. It is absolutely gorgeous. Do not size up! Stick to your true size as it is very stretchy. For reference I’m 5’6” and weigh 145 and I wear a small.

I got my normal size and it was cute, just a bit baggy. I would size down. The top kept rolling up, but I think it’s bc I have a larger chest. I did end up returning. But would’ve kept it in a smaller size and maybe added a split.

评论概述: Glitter Mesh and Poly Semi-Formal Dress.
评论详情: While I surprisingly like the fit and color of this dress, the fabric is nothing special. Seems overpriced for what it is. It’s a tight mesh over basic polyester lining with bits of square silver glitter throughout. Well made, yes, but still a little cheapo. I’m 5’7”, 115lbs, 34C, 27”Waist, 35”Hips, got a Small. I love the sleeves and off-shoulder look, but there’s not much shape to the body. The skirt flows out nicely though. The Wine is more red than burgundy, which I love. It’s a bummer this dress comes off more party time than chic and sophisticated. But, it will do for a number of semi-formal events.
The material is so thin, reminded me of a cheap Halloween costume.
I ordered a S and XS in the red color and received an XL. The S looked great despite being a touch too big (more info in a separate review), but I didn't get to try the size down unfortunately.

Got this for a Marine Corps Ball and it was Perfect! The quality and fabric is top notch. The only thing is I didn’t know which was the front or back of the dress and the flip over part kept riding up.
Absolutely fell in love with this gorgeous dress, previously ordered it in red but re ordered it in green. fits perfect.

It’s a gorgeous dress. It’s super soft and the sparkles are latched onto the dress it will not be all over the floor. You will need to mess around with the off the shoulder but once you get it, it won’t be a big deal. The off the shoulder has so much fabric you can get it adjusted probably without it coming back up too much. I wish I got a small or XS because a medium is comfortable but not fitted like the model. I wore a corset with it to give it shape and it looked great it also came all the at down to my feet. For ref I’m 5”4 34D 28W 37H I wear 2-3 in bottoms and small in tops.

评论概述: Dress is stunning! Looks like a $100 dress!
评论详情: Ordered a large. I'm usually a size 12 and 5' 7".  It has plenty of stretch. I have a wide waistline so it's hard to find dresses that suit my body type. It's modest yet sexy and flattering! My only negative is that the off the shoulder material does not stay folded down over my bust. I'd have to sew it down to maintain the look throughout the night. I'd def wear shapewear to complete the look. Overall I was happy with the value for the price!

I love this dress, and wish I could wear it off shoulder, however with broad shoulders I either need to size up so it’s loose everywhere (and lose the rest of the shape) or make some alterations (which is what I’ll do)  Pros Great lightweight material Cute shape Sleeves are adorable. Has a nice swishy quality of movement. Not as scratchy as you’d expect  Cons Sleeves seem small/tight for the corresponding size.  Note that if you are expecting actual sequins, that is not what you are getting with this dress. They are stick on sequins. Be mindful how you clean this to increase longevity.

评论概述: One of my new favorite dresses
评论详情: The most comfortable and flattering dresses. I needed a last minute dress and ordered this one! I was really impressed especially since there wasn’t many reviews. The quality is amazing and thick. I never leave reviews, but if you’re debating on getting this. Definitely BUY IT!  The color is really beautiful, Love the subtle details. I normally am a medium, but ordered a large. definitely could have fit a medium but still fit very flattering.
The fit is flattering very comfort it's flattering the quality of the material it h has sparkles in it and it's well made with stretch to it great for any occasion perfect for a date night

For formal occasions or weddings, the KUTUMAI Women Off Shoulder Bodycon Maxi Dress is a gorgeous option. The ruched shape nicely elongates the figure, while the mesh details and long sleeves lend an exquisite touch. It's ideal for parties and special occasions because the bodycon fit accentuates curves. You'll turn heads wherever you wear this dress since it blends refinement with a current off-the-shoulder design.
I really liked this dress. The only thing is that the top part that is supposed to stay off the shoulder kept popping back up. It's really long and the sleeves are really sweet too.

Exactly as described and pictured in the description listed! This dress sparkles in the reflective light, beautifully. Fit is body shape clinging but also flattering depending on your shape and how your style is you may or may not like the fit. Comfortable feeling on and it’s an overall good quality.
I got this dress for my Halloween Party as a part of the Witch costume. It is just gorgeous! Sparkles as the starry night. Beautiful flare-on-the-bottom sleeves. Fits nicely to the body. Stylish.
runs super small

评论概述: Stunning, sparkly but classy. XL fits true to size
评论详情: First of all the sparkly specks on this gown are bigger pieces than I imagined and it's hard to capture in photos. But it's really beautiful and doesn't look tacky at all. The sleeves are stretchy and fit perfect on my arms, not too tight in the upper arm and pits region. I'm 5'2" with 44 inch bust and 35 inch waist. The gown fits me like a glove! It's so pretty and hits the top of my feet so I can wear a short wedge if I want. I would need to hem it to wear flats. The fabric is pretty and flowy, seems to be well made with nice stitches.

I'm 5'5" and 156 lbs and I'm wearing a medium. This is so beautiful! It's so shimmery! It's also very comfortable and I love that there's a great length on the sleeves.  You can wear the off the shoulder down further than what I have it, so more of your chest and shoulders are exposed if you like, more like the description photo.  It's lined!!!  I don't have shapewear on with it, but I would wear it with some just to smooth everything out since it's so form fitting.  Very nice quality!

I was surprised at the "sequins"-- they're actually little squares of iridescent plastic stuck on. They have a stunning rainbow sparkle that I love, but it does make me worry about their longevity.  The sleeves are nice, transparent, and long. I like the flares at the ends. The material is all soft and comfortable.  I had a little trouble getting the neck to lie right. I think the problem was that I didn't pull it down my shoulders enough.  It seemed a little see-through up close, even though I got the black. It would probably be best to wear a layer underneath this, though it would also have to be strapless.

I hate to break rank here, but this dress didn't do me any favors.  There's no draping or shape to the torso portion so I continue to look like a roll of paper towels in this, and I felt self-conscious about my stomach.  The sleeves are quite long and have a bit of a Morticia Addams vibe with the flare at the end.  And I don't love the sparkle effect; it sort of gives "grandmother of the bride" vs. chic and classy, which is what I was going for.  The fabric is decent, but overall, this was my least favorite of several dresses that I tried on.
I wasn’t expecting to like this at all but this dress is so  flattering. Highly recommend!
If you have a wedding to attend, I highly recommend this dress. It's comfortable, elegant, and stylish.
I wore this dress to a party and got so many compliments. The off-shoulder design is really eye-catching.
The off shoulder and mesh details make this dress sexy yet still sophisticated.
I bought this to wear to a ballet with a more modest dress code and I think it is absolutely gorgeous great dress for a great price the quality is amazing

I gifted this to my girlfriend and after trying it on, we both decided it wasn't her style, but the dress itself is fantastic. The materials are very nice, and its very comfortable too. Definitely worth the buy if this dress is your style!

Very pleasantly surprised at the quality of this. Very flattering and high quality, good length- I am 5'4 not overly long but better with heels. This is layered so its not see-through. Very comfy, thick, but not hot, and very elegant looking. True to size! Rich brown color! Could be dressed up very fancy, or worn dressy casual.
The off shoulder and mesh detail on this dress makes it both sexy and elegant. Perfect for a party or wedding guest outfit.
This dress hugs my curves in all the right places and the mesh sleeves add a unique touch. I felt comfortable all night.
